scripts.pack-locally: (cd ../../ && npm run build && npm pack --silent) && mv ../../crowdsec-nodejs-bouncer-*.tgz ./cs-nodejs-bouncer.tgz
scripts.watch:all: nodemon --watch ../../dist --watch server.ts --watch helpers --watch tests --ext js,ts,ejs --exec "npm install --no-save ./cs-nodejs-bouncer.tgz && tsx server.ts"
scripts.dev: npm run pack-locally && npm install --no-save ./cs-nodejs-bouncer.tgz && npm run watch:all
